component.name: QPrompt
component.summary: Open source personal teleprompter software for professional content creators

description.p: Open source personal teleprompter software for professionals. Built with ease of use, fast performance, control accuracy, and cross-platform support in mind. QPrompt's convergent user interface can be built to run on Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android.
QPrompt is written in QML and C++, using the Qt and Kirigami frameworks.
